name: KOMRAD AR (Audio Reality)
description:
The Cold War Didn’t End—It Moved Online.

In this introduction, cyber-criminals have seized your online accounts but a government agent and a forgotten Soviet super-computer might hold the keys to your freedom.

In future chapters, you will train, upgrade, and personalize AI to engage in cyber warfare with mysterious entities and factions in a worldwide hunt for secrets that could tip the balance of power forever.

With Bose AR, play KOMRAD AR hands-free and heads up; using gesture and audio to control your AI and perform missions in the “field”—real world locations around you.
